name: Hoopz Planet Info
tag_list: context, contextual, search, mobile, app, internet, mobile-internet, discovery, tablet, information, content, commerce
overview:
Hoopz Planet Info is the next force behind Mobile Internet and Search, with its patent pending technologies for Discovery of Internet and aggregating Web Information useful and understandable to end user without asking user to search manually by typing search queries or browsing websites, what we call as “Auto Search” working across applications on a device without any API integration with the applications yet completely contextual in nature.

Its the World’s First Patent Pending cross application Contextual “Textual Augmented Reality” and “TouchtoExplore” Auto Search and Internet Discovery solution for mobile and tablet devices, potentially eradicating search box in long term. The beautiful part of the technology is that this does not require any interface with application to enable its context based Internet Discovery and works across all applications (preloaded or downloaded at any given point of time from app stores) without API/SDK integration with those apps.

It will radically change the way mobile internet is delivered, discovered and monetized !

Its unique technology will also bring in awesome internet exploration and web discovery experience to end users of devices and a large internet monetizations to any OEM/operator. This is next big thing in marking transitioning how we explore internet and how powerful and intelligent the devices can become for end users. We are working with Tier1 OEMs and Operators worldwide for the deployments of our technology on their devices.

This is the only technology which can monetize search on mobile as search engines did on desktop but failed to repeat on mobile !

external_links.title: Step Into the Future of Mobile Internet
